about_the_game: In the demo version, you can only play Caravan mode. Caravan mode is a 3-minute limited challenge to get a high score.
detailed_description: In the demo version, you can only play Caravan mode. Caravan mode is a 3-minute limited challenge to get a high score.
name: Missile Dancer 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows11,10,8,7
  • Processor: CPU 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows11,10,8,7
  • Processor: CPU 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: In the demo version, you can only play Caravan mode. Caravan mode is a 3-minute limited challenge to get a high score.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese
